settings.sub_title: DEAL DIRECTLY WITH THE SUPPLIER AND REAP THE BENEFITS

settings.info: We’re revolutionizing the decorating industry with higher quality products at a lower cost, while striving to eliminate paint waste.

settings.step_info: Browse our wide range of high-quality decorating products, including the trendiest colours, without breaking the bank. We offer unlimited quantities to suit your needs.

Fresh Lee on order with 28 years of experience, we manufacture our products in-house with complete quality control from start to finish. Our focus on high quality and environmental standards ensures that your purchase is the best it can be.

settings.step_title: We ship it to you with premium shipping
settings.step_info: Premium, Fast, Tracked 24-48H UK Shipping. Enjoy premium, tracked shipping for your order, ensuring that it arrives quickly and safely. All UK orders over £50 qualify for free shipping, making it even more convenient for you.

settings.step_title:
Become a part
of the change
settings.step_info: You're part of the change in breaking the false paint economy economy.  By choosing Paint Outlet, you are breaking the cycle of cheap, low-quality paint and contributing to a more sustainable future. Join us in creating a brighter and better tomorrow.

settings.title: Your product is in good hands
settings.sub_title: By manufacturing the paint ourselves, we have achieved a simple 4 step process, unlike many other retailers in the industry

Our commitment to sustainability, quality, and affordability has made us the go-to choice for major companies, blue chips, and top hotels. Join us in our mission to create a brighter, more sustainable future.

With over 25 years of experience, we have established ourselves as a trusted brand in the UK and worldwide.

settings.heading: Excessive Waste & c02
settings.text: Did you know that 415 million liters of paint are wasted each year, which only 2% is recycled, leading to huge paint wasted to landfill & the production. unnecessary carbon emissions ?  This happens because big manufacturers with large supply chains prioritise profit over the environment, flooding the market with subpar products.

settings.heading: Unreliable products flood
settings.text: The dominance of large manufacturers means limited choices for consumers.  You're left forced to pick either lower-quality, affordable options or pricey brands. Even If you choose premium products. it's difficult to trust how well products are produced. And often lack transparency, With so many misleading labels claiming "special features”.

settings.heading: Stuck in a false economy
settings.text: This never ending cycle creates a false paint economy upon short shelf life product, forcing paint buyer to repaint more frequently. This ultimately causes more paint to be produced in the world. Resulting in higher carbon dioxide emissions and more paint waste in landfills.
